text: The Tango Player () is a 1991 German drama film directed by Roland Gräf. It was entered into the 41st Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Michael Gwisdek as Hans-Peter Dallow * Corinna Harfouch as Elke * Hermann Beyer as Dr. Berger * Peter Prager as Roessler * Peter Sodann as Schulze * Reiner Heise as Müller * Jaecki Schwarz as Harry ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:1991 drama films Category:German films Category:German drama films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Roland Gräf Category:Films set in 1968
title: The Tango Player
